title: Precursor engineering for soft selective synthesis of phase pure metal-rich digenite (Cu9S5) and djurleite (Cu31S16) nanocrystals and investigation of their photo-switching characteristics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22656-22664
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04524F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Suraj Peerappa Yadav, Gourab Karmakar, Alpa Y. Shah, Bal Govind Vats, Ankita Pathak, Adish Tyagi, Rohit Singh Chauhan, Vishal Singh
Two copper complexes, CuX(dmpymSH)(PPh3)2 (where X = Cl or I), were applied as efficient single source precursors for phase selective isolation of Cu9S5 (digenite) and Cu31S16 (djurleite) nanomaterials in pure form.
